oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Jesse Washington Carmack
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tintype of Sgt. Jesse Washington Carmack, Co. F, 8th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA taken either before or after the war. He is dressed in civilian clothes. Carmack appears in another tintype in uniform (over001)" Carmack deserted the Confederate Army in December 1864. He took the oath of allegiance in February 1865. After the war he married Lucy Nolan and became a farmer.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carmack, Jesse Washington
